newsitem.title: USA: USDA seeks 1.26 mln lbs frozen ham for programs.
newsitem.headline: USDA seeks 1.26 mln lbs frozen ham for programs.

text.p: The Agricultural Marketing Service (AMS) of the U.S. Department of Agriculture said it was seeking to buy 1,260,000 lbs of frozen, smoked, fully cooked hams, Type II for use in the National School Lunch Program.
All offers must be in the format prescribed in LS-50 and be received by 1400 EST in Washington, D.C., on Monday, December 9, 1996. Acceptances will be announced by midnight Friday, December 13, 1996.
Shipments must be made between January 13 and January 26, 1997.
